name: Killer Inside Us
description:
Imagine being an astronaut. You have been sent with a grup of people into the space. When you finally reach the space station you are told to take care of the station. Unfortunately not everyone have good intentions. It occurs that there is a killer inside the station. Your job is to find out who the killer is while taking care of the station. But watch out: the killer can come out of nowhere when you won't be prepared. You shouldn't look for friends at the station - you don't know who the betrayer is. When you'll finally find out the killer don't be kind to him. Unconscionably kick him out of the station and save as many living souls as possiblePlay as crewmateIf you are crew find who is the impostor or fill the task bar to win

Play as Impostor

If you are an Impostor make sabotages and kill the crew to win game,

Features

  • Customization

  • Lots of game options
  • Quickly find a game online
  • In-game text chat
  • In-game voice chat
